decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: ZAAVIA/266WPR/201 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/202 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/203 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/204 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/205 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/206 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/207 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/208 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/209 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/210 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/211 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/212 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/213 (Issue: A), ZAAVIA/266WPR/214 (Issue: A), Location Plan, Design & Access Statement, Waste Management Plan

Reason:  In order to facilitate the use of section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to make minor material amendments to this planning permission.
description: Variation of Condition 4 of approved planning permission 2511/20: amend wording of condition 4 to reinstate the Permitted Development Rights of Loft for the host dwelling. (Summary).
